Projects.title: Our projects
Projects.card1D: Tourmad - This website, developed to develop domestic tourism in Uzbekistan, includes several services, including: Hotel services, Restaurant services, Tour services, Driver services for car travel and many other services. In addition, you can see for yourself where to go and how much the service costs on the site and make a reservation for yourself in advance.
Projects.card2D: Prorun.uz is a site that frequently hosts running competitions, and you can register on the site to participate in any or all of them. Why was the site built? Since there are foreign participants in the competitions, a new web application was developed to make it easier for them and other participants to register.

ServicesHome.title: Service Types
ServicesHome.titleP: Here are the most in-demand service types in the programming field:
ServicesHome.card1D: Short, impactful, and goal-driven pages designed to motivate users to take specific actions.
ServicesHome.card2D: Provides general company information, services, or product details.
ServicesHome.card3D: Sell products or services online. Includes payment systems and product management.
ServicesHome.card4D: Automates and manages client relations. Suitable for large companies or organizations dealing with many clients.
ServicesHome.card5D: Showcase personal or company work. Ideal for freelancers or creatives promoting their work.
ServicesHome.card6D: Share thoughts, news, or information. Useful for informing, engaging, and advertising to an audience.
ServicesHome.card7D: Provides general company information, services, or product details.
ServicesHome.card8D: An ERP platform is a comprehensive software that integrates all organizational processes, including finance, production, logistics, HR, and more.
ServicesHome.card9D: We support the development of new startup projects. If you have a startup idea, we are ready to work with you to bring it from concept to a fully functional product.

Service.IntroT1: We treat every type of service

Servicecard.cardLP1: Provides key information that grabs the visitor’s attention and encourages the next step.
Servicecard.cardLP2: Number of pages: 1 (each page will include at least 5 sections.)
Servicecard.cardPL2: Loads as fast as possible to respect users’ patience.
Servicecard.cardPR: Designed with a clear purpose to guide the user toward a specific action.

Servicecard2.2cardLP1: Each product is provided with detailed description, features, advantages, and images.
Servicecard2.2cardLP2: Various filters and sorting options are provided to make customer search easier.
Servicecard2.2cardLP3: A user-friendly navigation system is created for easy and intuitive browsing.
Servicecard2.2cardPL2: Number of pages: 1 (each page includes a minimum of 5 sections.)
Servicecard2.2cardPR: Web Design: 10–15 hours of work. Price: $100

Servicecard3.3cardLP1: Allows customers to buy products directly online.
Servicecard3.3cardLP2: Secure payment system ensures the protection of customer data.
Servicecard3.3cardLP3: Various delivery options can be integrated based on region and preferences.
Servicecard3.3cardPL2: Number of pages: each page includes a minimum of 5 sections.
Servicecard3.3cardPR: Web Design: 7–10 days of work. Price: $200–300

Servicecard4.4cardLP1: Informative blog section that improves SEO and user engagement.
Servicecard4.4cardLP2: Articles can be divided into categories for easier navigation.
Servicecard4.4cardLP3: Includes search and filtering for articles.
Servicecard4.4cardPL2: Number of pages: 1–2 (with at least 5 blocks).
Servicecard4.4cardPR: Web Design: 10–20 hours of work. Price: $100–150

Servicecard5.5cardLP1: Tools for editing, adding, deleting content and managing orders.
Servicecard5.5cardLP2: Role-based access for admins, editors, and clients.
Servicecard5.5cardLP3: Two-factor authentication and secure admin access.
Servicecard5.5cardPL2: Pages: Dashboard + Content + User control = 3–4 pages.

Servicecard6.6cardLP1: Users can view and edit their personal information and photos.
Servicecard6.6cardLP2: Notification and privacy settings are available.
Servicecard6.6cardLP3: Users can see their order history and statuses.

Servicecard7.7cardLP1: Secure login system using email or phone number.
Servicecard7.7cardLP3: Option to reset forgotten password via email or SMS.
Servicecard7.7cardPL2: Pages: Login + Register + Reset Password = 3 pages.
Servicecard7.7cardPR: Web Design: 8–12 hours of work. Price: $80–100

Servicecard8.8cardLP1: Designed to highlight the product/service with visuals and text.
Servicecard8.8cardLP2: Optimized for Google and other search engines.
Servicecard8.8cardLP3: Includes clear CTA buttons to encourage user interaction.
Servicecard8.8cardPL2: Number of blocks: 5–8 in one page.
